message.entry: Internal error getting file position.
Internal error reading from file.
Internal error resetting file position.
TEXTSCAN cannot read from stdin, stdout, or stderr.
{0} must be integer-valued.
{0} must be a string.
{0} has incorrect \\ constant.
Headerlines must be a positive integer.
Headercolumns must be a positive integer.
Buffer too small, using bufsize = 100 instead.\n
{0} must be a numeric scalar.
TreatAsEmpty strings cannot be numeric.
Cell arguments to TreatAsEmpty must contain non-numeric strings.
Arguments to TreatAsEmpty must be strings or cells of strings.
End of line character must be no more than a single character or \\r\\n
Comment Styles must not consist of more than two cells
Cell arguments to CommentStyle must contain strings.
Arguments to CommentStyle must be strings or cells of strings.
Characters can not be used in both whitespace and delimiter lists.\nRemoving delimiter chars from whitespace list.\n
Unterminated comment found. Remainder of file ignored.
Number of HeaderColumns is greater than number of columns in file.
Unable to read any data from the file, textscan may not have read access.
Buffer overflow (bufsize = {0,number,integer}) while reading {1} from file (row {2} u, field {3} u). Use 'bufsize' option. See HELP TEXTSCAN. {4}
Mismatch between file and format string.\nTrouble reading {0} from file (row {1}u, field {2}u) ==> {3}
Attempt to read unknown format from file.
Second input must be empty or a format string.
Param/value pairs must come in pairs.
Unknown option ''{0}''.
Badly formed format string.
First input can not be empty.
First input must be of type double or string.
{0} must be a string or cell array of strings.
{0} cannot be an empty cell array.
